Поле: mut3_genotype

Поле: olfaction_sympt
Правило: Enter 'yes' if olfactory dysfunction (hyposmia/anosmia) is present, 'no' if explicitly stated as normal, or -99 if not reported.
Поле: sleep_benefit_sympt
Правило: Enter 'yes' if sleep benefit is present, 'no' if explicitly stated as absent, or -99 if not reported.

Правило: Enter 'het' for heterozygous, 'hom' for homozygous, or 'hemi' for hemizygous mutations. If not applicable or not reported, enter -99.
Поле: mut2_g
Правило: Enter the genomic notation (g.) for the second mutation using HGVS format. If not applicable or not reported, enter -99.
Поле: gene1
Правило: Enter the official HGNC-approved gene symbol for the first pathogenic variant reported. If none found or not applicable, enter -99.
Поле: mut1_p
Правило: Enter the protein change (amino acid level) corresponding to the first mutation, using HGVS protein nomenclature and the three-letter amino acid code (e.g., p.Gln171* for a glutamine to stop codon change). Use the notation as given in the manuscript (it will be adjusted to HGVS format if needed). If no mutation reported or applicable, enter -99.
Поле: depression_scale
Правило: Enter the name of the depression scale used and the score if available (e.g., 'BDI: 18'). If not reported, enter -99.
Поле: num_hom_mut_unaffected
Правило: Enter the number of unaffected individuals with homozygous mutations in the family. If not reported or not applicable, enter -99.
Поле: non_motor_symptoms
Правило: Provide a list of non-motor symptoms and their status (e.g., 'Depression: yes; Anosmia: no'). If none are mentioned or present, state 'None'.
Поле: num_wildtype_affected
Правило: Enter the number of affected individuals with no mutations (wildtype) in the family. If not reported or not applicable, enter -99.
Поле: motor_symptoms
Правило: Provide a list of motor symptoms and their status (e.g., 'Rigidity: yes; Tremor: no'). If none are mentioned or present, state 'None'.
Поле: comments_pat
Правило: Enter any patient-specific comments or clarifications here. If the patient is excluded (mdsgene_decision = EX), include the reason for exclusion in this field so that the rationale is clear upon review. Otherwise, use this field for any notable details about the individual not captured by other variables. If none, enter -99.
Поле: sex
Правило: Enter 'M' for male, 'F' for female. If not specified, enter -99.
Поле: mut2_alias
Правило: Enter any standardized alternative notation for the second mutation. If not applicable, enter -99.
Поле: observed_allele3
Правило: Enter the mutant nucleotide(s) for the third mutation. If not applicable or not reported, enter -99.
Поле: motor_sympt
Правило: Enter 'yes' if motor symptoms are present, 'no' if explicitly stated as absent, or -99 if not reported.
Поле: diurnal_fluctuations_sympt
Правило: Enter 'yes' if diurnal fluctuations are present, 'no' if explicitly stated as absent, or -99 if not reported.
Поле: study_design
Правило: Classify the study design as 'case report', 'case series', 'case-control', 'cohort', 'review', or other appropriate epidemiological classification. If not explicitly stated, infer from context. If unclear, enter -99.
Поле: initial_sympt2

Поле: fun_evidence_pos_1
Правило: Enter a brief description of functional evidence supporting pathogenicity (e.g., 'reduced enzyme activity', 'protein misfolding'). If none reported, enter -99.
Поле: age_death
Правило: Enter the age at death as a numerical value in years. If not applicable or not reported, enter -99.
Поле: mut2_zygosity
Правило: Enter the zygosity of the second mutation (usually 'heterozygous' for a compound heterozygous case). If not applicable or not stated, leave blank or -99.
Поле: dystonia_sympt
Правило: Enter 'yes' if dystonia is present, 'no' if explicitly stated as absent, or -99 if not reported.
Поле: initial_sympt1
Правило: Enter the primary initial symptom as explicitly reported in the publication (e.g., rigidity, tremor). If not reported clearly, enter -99.
Поле: ethnicity
Правило: Enter the ethnicity as reported in the article. Use standardized categories (e.g., 'European', 'East Asian', 'African') when appropriate. If not reported, enter -99.
Поле: physical_location2
Правило: Enter the chromosomal coordinate of the second mutation in the format 'chromosome:position' (e.g., '12:123456'). If not applicable or not provided, enter -99.
Поле: motor_instrument2

Поле: NMS_scale

Поле: tremor_dystonic_sympt
Правило: Enter 'yes' if dystonic tremor is present, 'no' if explicitly stated as absent, or -99 if not reported.
Поле: upper_age_limit
Правило: Enter the upper age limit in years for study inclusion criteria if reported. If not applicable or not reported, enter -99.
Поле: parkinsonism_sympt
Правило: Enter 'yes' if parkinsonism is present, 'no' if explicitly stated as absent, or -99 if not reported.
Поле: pathogenicity1
Правило: Enter classification as 'pathogenic', 'likely pathogenic', 'VUS' (variant of uncertain significance), 'likely benign', or 'benign'. If not reported, enter -99.

Поле: motor_instrument1

AII-11.clinical_info: Patient AII-11 was a 77-year-old man who developed right upper limb rest tremor at age 62. At age 75, he underwent gastrostomy for progressive dysphagia, then developed cognitive dysfunction without hallucination. Single-photon emission computed tomography of cerebral blood flow showed no reduction in blood flow in the basal ganglia.
AII-11.non_motor_symptoms: Orthostatic hypotension: yes; Incontinence: yes; Urinary urgency: yes; Hallucination: no; Other psychosis: no; Dementia: no; Cognitive dysfunction: yes
AII-11.motor_symptoms: Resting tremor: yes; Bradykinesia: yes; Rigidity: yes; Gait disturbance: yes; Postural instability: yes; Levodopa-induced dyskinesia: yes; Dystonia at onset: no
AII-11.comments_pat: 77-year-old man, developed right upper limb rest tremor at age 62. At age 75, underwent gastrostomy for progressive dysphagia, then developed cognitive dysfunction without hallucination. Single-photon emission computed tomography of cerebral blood flow showed no reduction in blood flow in the basal ganglia.
AII-11.study_design: Genetic screening study for VPS35 mutations in Japanese patients with autosomal dominant Parkinson's disease (ADPD), sporadic Parkinson's disease (SPD), and control subjects.

AII-11.genet_methods: PCR direct sequencing, high-resolution melting (HRM) analysis, Haplotype analysis.
